unnormalised: Chai just got a little more expensive, folks! Gas cylinder prices are up AGAIN.
normalised: Chai just got a little more expensive, folks! Gas cylinder prices are up again. Our friendly neighborhood gas wala, Ramu Kaka, confirmed that the price hike hit this morning. Domestic L P G cylinders will now cost rupee fifty more, pushing the subsidized cylinder past the rupee one thousand one hundred mark in Delhi. This is the second hike in as many months! Housewives like Missus Sharma in Bandra are already feeling the pinch. "It is getting harder and harder to manage the household budget," she sighed, while supervising construction on their new two thousand square feet apartment. Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are blaming global crude oil prices and fluctuating exchange rates for the continued upward trend. Doctor Patel, a leading energy analyst, stated, "We can expect further volatility in the coming months." Meanwhile, the government is tight-lipped, offering no immediate relief. Time to start perfecting that chulha cooking, maybe? Or perhaps explore those fancy induction cooktops your techie nephew, Rohan, keeps talking about. Inflation is a real 'dandia' with our wallets!

unnormalised: Our friendly neighborhood gas wala, Ramu Kaka, confirmed that the price hike hit this morning. Domestic LPG cylinders will now cost Rs. 50 more, pushing the subsidized cylinder past the Rs. 1100 mark in Delhi. This is the second hike in as many months!

Housewives like Mrs. Sharma in Bandra are already feeling the pinch. "It's getting harder and harder to manage the household budget," she sighed, while supervising construction on their new 2000 sq ft apartment.

Experts at IIM Ahmedabad are blaming global crude oil prices and fluctuating exchange rates for the continued upward trend. Dr. Patel, a leading energy analyst, stated, "We can expect further volatility in the coming months."

Meanwhile, the government is tight-lipped, offering no immediate relief. Time to start perfecting that chulha cooking, maybe? Or perhaps explore those fancy induction cooktops your techie nephew, Rohan, keeps talking about. Inflation is a real 'dandia' with our wallets!
